scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && python -m uv run python -m scripts.dev
scripts.start: cd backend && python -m uv run python -m app.main
scripts.test: pnpm run test:backend && pnpm run test:frontend
scripts.test:backend: cd backend && python -m uv run pytest
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:backend && pnpm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && python -m uv run ruff check .
scripts.setup: pnpm install && cd backend && python -m uv sync && python -m uv run python -m scripts.setup_data
